casebody.data:
In the Matter of TRIANGLE METAL NOVELTY CORP., Bankrupt, Izak Fried, Appellant. No. 61. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Nov. 16, 1931. Hoenig & Hoenig, of New York City (Moses H. Hoenig, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Copal Mintz, of New York City, for Trustee.

Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Orders affirmed, with costs.
